titleStmt.title: To the Kings most Excellent Majesty, the hvmble answer of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, to His Majesties last message the 11. September, 1642. With a true coppy of the message.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Title within border of printer's ornaments
"16. Septemb. 1642. Ordered by the lords in Parliament, that this message with the answer shall be forthwith printed and published. J. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum."
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
